thread.title: Trump Cajoles Republicans on His Immigration Framework

author: Siobhan Hughes
title: Trump Cajoles Republicans on His Immigration Framework
text:
WHITE SULPHUR SPRINGS, W.Va.—President Donald Trump on Thursday promoted his four-part immigration plan in remarks to Republican lawmakers but stopped short of insisting that the Senate take up his bill.
Mr. Trump’s framework calls for increased funding for a wall along the southern border, an end to the diversity visa lottery and limits on family-based migration in exchange for a path to citizenship for 1.8 million people brought to the country illegally when they were young.
